# c15m

Shows an intraday 15m chart for the ticker provided.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/c15m ticker
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |


---

## Examples

```
/c15m ticker:AMD
```

---
